name: Barbara CARROLL, Next Best Friend of Michael Carroll v. COVENTRY SCHOOL DEPT. et al.
name_abbreviation: Carroll ex rel. Carroll v. Coventry School Dept.

parties: Barbara CARROLL, Next Best Friend of Michael Carroll v. COVENTRY SCHOOL DEPT. et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted. The petitioner’s motion to proceed thereon in forma pauperis is granted.

attorneys: S. Arlene Violet, Providence, for petitioner.
Gunning, LaFazia & Gnys, Inc., Providence, Bennett R. Gallo, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
Barbara CARROLL, Next Best Friend of Michael Carroll v. COVENTRY SCHOOL DEPT. et al.
No. 82-67-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 21, 1982.
S. Arlene Violet, Providence, for petitioner.
Gunning, LaFazia & Gnys, Inc., Providence, Bennett R. Gallo, for respondents.
